name: wc-stress-component
description: Monorepo for Web Components stress testing with Lit and Stencil

scripts.dev: npm run copy:components && npm run dev --workspace=apps/nextjs-wc
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:lit && npm run build:stencil
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run copy:components && npm run build:next
scripts.copy:components: npm run copy:lit && npm run copy:stencil
scripts.copy:lit: cp packages/wc-lit/counter-component.js apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/ && cp packages/wc-lit/user-card.js apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/
scripts.copy:stencil: cp -r packages/wc-stencil/dist apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/ && cp -r packages/wc-stencil/loader apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/
scripts.copy:lit-deps: cp -r node_modules/lit apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/ && cp -r node_modules/@lit apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/ && cp -r node_modules/lit-html apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/ && cp -r node_modules/lit-element apps/nextjs-wc/public/components/
scripts.prebuild: npm run build:packages && npm run copy:components
scripts.clean:packages: npm run clean --workspace=packages/wc-lit && npm run clean --workspace=packages/wc-stencil
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:packages && npm run copy:components
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:packages && npm run copy:components && npm run dev
